title: Death Warmed Over
description: In the conclusion of the Lily Drake series, Lily must choose not only what is best for herself and her son, but for her people. Her sword will be stained with blood through her efforts to preserve the lives of the people she loves, but she won’t be able to save them all. When a devastating loss crushes her will to live, can Lily go on and be the leader she has to be? What is she willing to sacrifice to save others?Death comes to everyone...even the Queen’s house...What doesn't kill you will make you wish it did...
author: T. Michelle Nelson
